document_data.title: The Broken Sphere
document_data.author: [[Nigel Findley]]

document_data.mainbody:
'''''The Broken Sphere''''' by [[Nigel Findley]] is book five in the [[Cloakmaster Cycle]], a six-book series for the [[Spelljammer: AD&D Adventures in Space|Spelljammer]] campaign setting and the second by that author.
{{Quote|[[Teldin Moore]]'s magic amulet allows him to "see" through the eyes of the great ship [[Spelljammer (spelljammer)|''Spelljammer'']], across the [[Wildspace|wilds of space]]. Following clues from an ancient [[Gnome|gnomish]] library and the vision he sees, he traces the mighty craft through the [[crystal sphere]]s. He employs his [[Cloak of the Firs Pilot|magical cloak's]] powers and discovers his quarry's home, but Teldin's cloak—and the possibility it could give him control over the ''Spelljammer''—continues to draw enemies, often in the guise of friends. Will he survive long enough to face the final danger that awaits him at the point of the ''Spelljammer's'' origin—the [[Broken Sphere]]?}}
